item.description: Many Irish explain their attitude toward Israel as a commitment to international law or as the reflex of a former colony. This doesn’t hold up under s...

item.title: Tulsi Gabbard: The Bold Choice to Fix a Broken Intelligence Community
item.description: Her appointment would send an unmistakable message: The days of the intelligence community operating as an unaccountable black box are over.

item.title: Trump Is an Appalling Hypocrite When It Comes to Lawfare
item.description: Should we now cheer the sort of lawfare we denounced when it was used against Trump, merely because he’s returning serve?

item.title: Twelve Months of Milei
item.description: The week of December 9, 2024: Argentina stirs, Fiscal policy, antitrust, regulation, deregulation, and much, much more.

item.title: Trump Is Right about Creating a U.S. Iron Dome
item.description: Missile defense should be one of his highest priorities.
